subSubSection.paragraph: This species was commonly encountered in the sandy washes immediately surrounding MDRS (Fig. 31). Widely variable across its range, Welsh et al. (1993) report nine named varieties in Utah, and Harris (1983) reports L. montanum var. jonesii (Rydb.) C.L. Hitch. from the nearby San Rafael Swell. Al-Shebaz and Gaskin (2010) subsume these varieties into L. montanum sensu lato pending a thorough study of infraspecific delimitation; we follow their treatment here.
